thread.title: This App Can Block Windows 10 Data Collection for a Price
thread.title_full: This App Can Block Windows 10 Data Collection for a Price - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: This App Can Block Windows 10 Data Collection for a Price
text: Microsoft hasn't yet fully addressed the Windows 10 privacy issue, so third-party apps that can help you with that are still getting a ton of downloads every day and it's no wonder why: users want to block the OS from collecting their data and sending it to the parent company. Privacy Protector for Windows 10 is one of the many apps that can help you with this, allowing you not only to disable the services responsible for collecting your data, but also by uninstalling some ... Â»
